instructions.step: Mix the stock cube and harissa with 200ml boiling water and pour over the couscous, cover and leave for 5 minutes before fluffing up with a fork.
Meanwhile, heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the nuts and salad onions for 1-2 minutes, add the spinach, cover and cook for 1-2minutes until wilted.
Stir the couscous into the spinach mixture and season.
